com.persistit

Interface ReadOnlyExchange

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Exchange

    public interface ReadOnlyExchange
    Methods of the Exchange class that are safe to use within a Exchange.TraverseVisitor.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long getChangeCount()
      Return the count of structural changes committed to the Tree on which this Exchange operates.
      Key getKey()
      Return the Key associated with this Exchange.
      Persistit getPersistitInstance()
      Return the Persistit instance from which this Exchange was created.
      Transaction getTransaction()
      The transaction context for this Exchange.
      Tree getTree()
      Return the Tree on which this Exchange operates.
      Value getValue()
      Return the Value associated with this Exchange.
      Volume getVolume()
      Return the Volume containing the data accessed by this Exchange.

    • Method Detail

      • getKey

        Key getKey()
        Return the Key associated with this Exchange.
        Returns:
        This Key.

      • getValue

        Value getValue()
        Return the Value associated with this Exchange.
        Returns:
        The Value.

      • getVolume

        Return the Volume containing the data accessed by this Exchange.

      • getTree

        Tree getTree()
        Return the Tree on which this Exchange operates.
        Returns:

      • getPersistitInstance

        Persistit getPersistitInstance()
        Return the Persistit instance from which this Exchange was created.
        Returns:
        The Persistit instance.

      • getChangeCount

        long getChangeCount()
        Return the count of structural changes committed to the Tree on which this Exchange operates. This count includes changes committed by all Threads, including the current one. A structural change is one in which at least one key is inserted or deleted. Replacement of an existing value is not counted.
        Returns:
        The change count

      • getTransaction

        Transaction getTransaction()
        The transaction context for this Exchange. By default, this is the transaction context of the current thread, and by default, all Exchanges created by a thread share the same transaction context.
        Returns:
        The Transaction context for this thread.
